org.smartfrog.test
Class LocalTestDaemon

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.test.LocalTestDaemon

public class LocalTestDaemon
extends java.lang.Object

A test daemon runs smartfrog. When the object is disposed/finalised, it disposes of the instance of smartfrog. Always use the dispose() method, as the finalize() method is not guaranteed to run. The object is not intended to be used across threads, though it is probably thread safe. Core methods are synchronized.
